name: haushmph
body: |- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cha)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wbr(c0, chmph, c1), wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c1, cha)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cha), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cha), wf1(cv(hs0), cuni(c1), cuni(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c1, ccn, c0))), wcel(c1, cha))
-| diffsc(hs0, c0)
-| diffsc(hs0, c1)
-| diffsc(hs0, cha)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0[~ =]c1 →(c0 ∈ Haus → c1 ∈ Haus))
⊣ (c0 ∈ Haus → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Haus ∧(hs0 : ⋃ c1 ↣ ⋃ c0)∧ hs0 ∈(c1[Cn]c0))→ c1 ∈ Haus)
⊣ d(hs0, c0)
⊣ d(hs0, c1)
⊣ d(hs0, Haus)

comment: Hausdorff-ness is a topological property. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
